title: How to use Cricut to make sticker sheets - Quora

response.answer_text: You buy sticker paperYou cut your design out of the paper.You can find the paper online or at your craft store or at you office supply store. You could try to adjust the blade depth to only cut the top sheet, but not the bottom liner, but I would probably not waste my time. I do not find the Cricut to be that precise when it comes to depth of cut in a given material.
